name: Company Take Down
description:
I've been coding for a long time and this was my first jam but I have made some games in short periods before.  I'd say this is one of the better ones.  There still was some things I would of liked to have and some improvements to both my art and music (All content made by me)

The game itself is written in c++ using my own custom engine.  It uses openGL for graphics, fmod for audio, freetype for some text the logo / option fonts were drawn by me, and lodePNG to load textures into openGL.   It's a long running engine that I overhauled just for this jam but still had to make some adjustments to it during the jam itself.
